titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 40th anniversary of the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Kerry with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and with an amended preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 345.

bill.summary: 4/13/2010--Reported to Senate amended. Reaffirms Senate support for the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons. Urges the President to: (1) work to achieve universal Treaty compliance; and (2) ensure that the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) has the necessary resources to conduct its Treaty oversight responsibilities. Encourages the President to work with: (1) international partners and Treaty states to promote the Model Additional Protocol to all Safeguards Agreements as the global standard for safeguards and a requirement for nuclear commerce; and (2) other Treaty states to strengthen compliance and enforcement mechanisms and develop collective responses in the U.N. Security Council and other multilateral fora to any notification of Treaty withdrawal.
